channel.title: [508]Changing xp rates - HELP PLEASE
channel.description: Im using davidscapes source, and im trying to change the xp rates for combat. I have combed through almost every single freakin file looking for what was described in the "various beginner tutorials" post, but nothing like that was found. How do i change xp rates on this? its rediculous.

item.title: [508]Changing xp rates - HELP PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @kpop kpop
item.description:
@kpop wrote:

have u checked your player.java? if u search around in there u’ll see this…

[code] /**
* Get xp based on your level.
* @param skillId The skill level to get the level based off XP for.
* @return Returns the level based on the amount of XP the specified skill has.
*/
public int getLevelForXP(int skillId) {
int exp = skillXP[skillId];
int points = 0;
int output = 0;

    for (int lvl = 1; lvl < 250; lvl++) {
        points += Math.floor(
                (double) lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double) lvl / 7.0));
        output = (int) Math.floor(points / 4);
        if ((output - 1) >= exp) {
            return lvl;
        }
    }

return 99;
}[/code]
try messin with that

Read full topic
